sn35.9:3.1: 9 The Interior as Not-Self in the Three Times
sn35.9:4.1: “Mendicants, the eye of the past and future is not-self,
sn35.9:4.3: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple doesn’t worry about the eye of the past,
sn35.9:4.4: they don’t look forward to enjoying the eye in the future,
sn35.9:4.5: and they practice for the disillusionment, fading away, and cessation of the eye in the present. …”
